articles.description: Our selections against the spread for all seven Big Ten games this week
articles.content:
In Week 4, there was bad, and there was worse.
All five of our pickers were below .500 in the nine games we selected last week. Aaron McMann and Andrew Kahn were the best at 4-5. Our Michigan State … [+6850 chars]
